Project Summary

Project Information

FieldValue
NameHandy URI Templates
DescriptionHandy URI Templates is a RFC6570 compliant URI template processor. The library allows clients to utilize templatized URIs and inject replacement variables to expand the template into a URI. The library sports a fluent API, ability to plugin custom object renderers, and supports all levels of URI templates.
Homepagehttps://github.com/damnhandy/Handy-URI-Templates
